scripts.image:push: npm run docker:login && docker build -t repo.lugobots.dev/$npm_package_name:v$npm_package_version . && docker push repo.lugobots.dev/$npm_package_name:v$npm_package_version
scripts.bot:test:home: PLAYER_BOT=$npm_package_name:v$npm_package_version MY_SIDE=home OPPONENT_SIDE==away docker compose --file test-docker-compose.yml -p tester up
scripts.bot:test:away: PLAYER_BOT=$npm_package_name:v$npm_package_version MY_SIDE=away OPPONENT_SIDE==home docker compose --file test-docker-compose.yml -p tester up
scripts.bot:run: npm run build && docker compose up
scripts.bot:run:home: npm run build && PLAYER_SIDE=home OPPONENT_SIDE=away docker compose up
scripts.bot:run:away: npm run build && PLAYER_SIDE=away OPPONENT_SIDE=home docker compose up
